name: Factor-y
description:
Overview

You're a worker at Factor-y. Produce requested numbers by multiplying FACTORs. Produce as much as you can to get a high score!

This game was created for Trijam #57: The 3 hour game jam. (Theme: Factory)

How to play
  • Basics
    • Click a button at the bottom to multiply a FACTOR (a number) to your product you're working on.
    • When the product becomes the same numeral as the one displayed on the screen, that product is finished. You get scores and move on to the next one.
    • When you try to multiply a wrong FACTOR, the product explodes and you won't get scores for finishing a product.
    • You have only 30 seconds. Produce as much products as you can!
  • Scores
    • +(The numeral of the product) for finishing a product.
    • +(The numeral of the FACTOR) for multiplying a FACTOR.
Assets used
  • Another Round (Font)
  • 効果音ラボ (SE)
  • DOTween (Tweening Library)
Credits
